entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
